ing: 10 fluid ounces hot water (200 degrees F (93 degrees C))
des: "The only way I can drink black coffee! A little bit of cinnamon goes a long way. If you're making a larger number of servings, just add a dash more cinnamon per serving to your normal amount of grounds."
ins: Mix ground coffee and cinnamon together in a small bowl. Pour in hot water. Allow to brew, about 5 minutes. Strain into a mug.
